I came, I saw, I conquered
The beginnings of all things are small
Money is the soul of war
What has been wrongly gained is wrongly lost
We can’t all of us do everything
Leave all else to the gods
The cause of fear is ignorance
Let us live, since we must die
A healthy mind in a healthy body
Art is long, life is short
Quis, Quid, Ubi, Quibus Auxiliis, Cur, Quomodo, Quando? ~ Quintilian
Who, what, where, with what, why, how, when?
Let no one untrained in geometry enter
A jackdaw is always found near a jackdaw
An eagle's old age is worth a sparrow's youth
Not even the gods fight necessity
Stand a little out of my sun
Gēraskō d' aíeí pollâ didaskómenos ~ Solon
I grow old always learning many things
Diploûn horôsin hoi mathóntes grámmata ~ Pythagoras
Those who know the letters see double
Either with your shield, or on it
I came, I saw, I conquered
Iskhýs mou hē agápē toû laoû
The people's love is my strength
Mḕ moû toùs kúklous táratte ~ Archimedes
The least bad choice is best
Along with Athena, move also your hand
Tà pánta rheî kaì oudèn ménei
Tí dýskolon? Tò heautòn gnônai ~ Thales
What is hard? To know thyself
Tí eúkolon? Tò állōi hypotíthesthai ~ Thales
What is easy? To advise another
Tí próteron gegónoi, nùx ē hēméra? núx, miâi hēmérai próteron ~ Thales
Which is older, day or night? Night is the older, by one day
